Articles.Content:
Seeing as the next version is going to be a rather large one, and the team needs a lot of help to test bugs, I\'m conducting an audit of the testing team. Those who\'ve not participated at all or have no logged into the forums for several months are being removed to, 'Eventually' make way for new testers. Note, this is not opening recruitment to the test team at this time, so don\'t ask.

-DR
